Protecting Yourself and Your Funds

  • Bookmark your site. Use bookmark to access your Aion Wallet
  • Do not trust messages or addresses or URLs sent via private message. Always verify information w/ a secondary source.
  • Don’t click any link forwarding you to the Aion Wallet
  • Never enter any information specially your private key before checking the certificate and the address https://wallet.aion.network of the website
  • Use Two-Factor Authentication for everything.
  • We recommend using Google Authenticator if you are using third party applications such as Lastpass to backup your private key, keystore file, and password
    • PS: Aion Wallet is client-side, meaning two-factor authentication is not to access your account but to safely maintain credentials that give access to your account
  • Cross check that you are on the correct website before doing any transaction or entering any data
